This NetLogo model allows you to try Axelrod‚Äôs tournaments yourself by creating some strategies and testing them in an iterated Prisoner‚Äôs Dilemma.

item.title: Aquaworld Radiation Balance (2018)
item.author: rik.blok@ubc.ca (Rik Blok)
item.description: This simple radiation balance model shows the greenhouse effect that an atmosphere can have in warming a planet. By trapping some of the radiation emitted by the planet the atmosphere can cause the surface to become warmer than it otherwise would be.
